Rattata.Moon: With their strong capacity for survival, they can live in dirty places without concern. Left unchecked, their numbers multiply rapidly.
Rattata.Ultra Sun: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.
Rattata.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is common but hazardous. Its sharp incisors can easily cut right through hard wood.

Pikachu.Blue: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

Zubat.Red: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
Zubat.Blue: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

Tentacool.Red: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
Tentacool.Blue: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

Slowpoke.Ultra Sun: There are some places where Slowpoke is worshiped because of a long-standing belief that whenever Slowpoke yawns, it rains.
Slowpoke.Ultra Moon: Although their tails, which fall off naturally, can easily be found lying around, they're a precious ingredient for cooking.

Slowbro.Red: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
Slowbro.Blue: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

Slowbro.Silver: Naturally dull to begin with, it lost its ability to feel pain due to SHELLDER's seeping poison.
Slowbro.Crystal: An attached SHELLDER won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
Slowbro.Ruby: SLOWBRO's tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.

Magnemite.Red: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
Magnemite.Blue: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
Magnemite.Yellow: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.
Magnemite.Gold: It is attracted by electromagnetic waves. It may approach trainers if they are using their POKéGEAR.
Magnemite.Silver: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.
Magnemite.Crystal: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.

Magnemite.Sapphire: MAGNEMITE floats in the air by emitting electromagnetic waves from the units at its sides. These waves block gravity. This POKéMON becomes incapable of flight if its internal electrical supply is depleted.
Magnemite.FireRed: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges THUNDER WAVE and so on from the units at its sides.
Magnemite.LeafGreen: Uses antigravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
Magnemite.Emerald: The units at its sides are extremely powerful magnets. They generate enough magnetism to draw in iron objects from over 300 feet away.

Magnemite.Platinum: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.

Magnemite.Sun: They gather in places where electricity is available. They can be found clinging to the steel towers used to support power lines.

Magneton.Red: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
Magneton.Blue: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

Dodrio.Red: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.
Dodrio.Blue: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

Grimer.Alpha Sapphire: Grimer emerged from the sludge that settled on a polluted seabed. This Pokémon loves anything filthy. It constantly leaks a horribly germ-infested fluid from all over its body.
Grimer.Sun: Its main source of food is the slimy industrial waste of factories. This Pokémon's numbers have been decreasing in recent years.
Grimer.Moon: It was born from sludge transformed by exposure to X-rays from the moon. When its internal load of germs decreases, it dies.
Grimer.Ultra Sun: It was born from sludge on the ocean floor. In a sterile environment, the germs within its body can't multiply, and it dies.
Grimer.Ultra Moon: The wastewater coming from factories is clean these days, so Grimer have nothing to eat. They're said to be on the verge of extinction.

Muk.Red: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
Muk.Blue: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
Muk.Yellow: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration, it lost its sense of smell.
Muk.Gold: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.
Muk.Silver: Its body is made of a powerful poison. Touching it accidentally will cause a fever that requires bed rest.
Muk.Crystal: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.
Muk.Ruby: From MUK's body seeps a foul fluid that gives off a nose-bendingly horrible stench. Just one drop of this POKéMON's body fluid can turn a pool stagnant and rancid.
Muk.Sapphire: This POKéMON's favorite food is anything that is repugnantly filthy. In dirty towns where people think nothing of throwing away litter on the streets, MUK are certain to gather.

Muk.LeafGreen: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

Shellder.Blue: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

Gastly.Blue: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

Gastly.Moon: Although Gastly is barely visible, when it's near, a faint sweet smell lingers.
Gastly.Ultra Sun: It's said that gas emanating from a graveyard was possessed by the grievances of the deceased and thus became a Pokémon.

Haunter.Red: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
Haunter.Blue: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
Haunter.Yellow: By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.
Haunter.Gold: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently stalking its next victim.
Haunter.Silver: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
Haunter.Crystal: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.
Haunter.Ruby: HAUNTER is a dangerous POKéMON. If one beckons you while floating in darkness, you must never approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

Haunter.Pearl: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.

Gengar.Red: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
Gengar.Blue: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
Gengar.Yellow: A GENGAR is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.

Gengar.Platinum: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a GENGAR delighting in casting curses on people.

Gengar.Ultra Sun: You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty.
Gengar.Ultra Moon: Even your home isn't safe. Gengar will lurk in whatever dark corner of a room it can find and wait for its chance to catch its prey.

Onix.Blue: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

Crobat.Sun: Both its legs became wings, and as a result, it can't move well on the ground. All it can do is crawl around.

Crobat.Ultra Sun: Its fangs are so sharp, if it bites you in the dark and sucks your blood, you won't notice any pain or realize you've been bitten.
Crobat.Ultra Moon: It feeds on the blood of living people and Pokémon. If it can't drink any blood for even a short while, it becomes weak and unable to fly.

Swablu.White: It can't relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.

Lunatone.Ruby: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.

Barboach.Ruby: BARBOACH's sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
Barboach.Sapphire: BARBOACH's body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this POKéMON just slips out of the enemy's grip. This POKéMON grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.

Barboach.LeafGreen: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

Barboach.Pearl: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
Barboach.Platinum: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.

Whiscash.Ruby: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
Whiscash.Sapphire: If WHISCASH goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This POKéMON has the ability to predict real earthquakes.

Whiscash.LeafGreen: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, WHISCASH will eat it.

Whiscash.Pearl: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
Whiscash.Platinum: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

Corphish.LeafGreen: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted streams.

Crawdaunt.Ruby: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.
Crawdaunt.Sapphire: CRAWDAUNT molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this POKéMON hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.

Crawdaunt.LeafGreen: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

Tropius.Ruby: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS's neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.

Tropius.FireRed: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

Tropius.Emerald: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.

Tropius.Pearl: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
Tropius.Platinum: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.

Chimecho.LeafGreen: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.

Chimecho.Pearl: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
Chimecho.Platinum: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
Chimecho.HeartGold: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.

Absol.Ruby: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
Absol.Sapphire: ABSOL has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This POKéMON very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
Absol.FireRed: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
Absol.LeafGreen: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
Absol.Emerald: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived POKéMON that has a life-span of 100 years.
Absol.Diamond: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
Absol.Pearl: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
Absol.Platinum: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.

Absol.Moon: Although it's said to bring disaster, in actuality, this Pokémon possesses a calm disposition and warns people of any crises that loom.

Absol.Ultra Moon: The elderly call it the disaster Pokémon and detest it, but interest in its power to predict disasters is on the rise.

Snorunt.Ruby: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
Snorunt.Sapphire: SNORUNT survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this POKéMON is sure to prosper for many generations to come.

Snorunt.LeafGreen: It is said that a home visited by a SNORUNT will prosper. It can withstand cold of minus 150 degrees Fahrenheit.

Snorunt.Platinum: It is said that several SNORUNT gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.

Glalie.LeafGreen: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

Spheal.LeafGreen: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.

Walrein.LeafGreen: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.

Whimsicott.Sun: It rides on the wind and slips into people's homes. After it has turned a room into a cotton- filled mess, it giggles to itself and takes off.
Whimsicott.Moon: This Pokémon appears, riding upon the wind. But if the wind gusts up, it'll blow the cotton on this Pokémon's head clean off.
Whimsicott.Ultra Sun: This nuisance sneaks into people's homes, where it hides important things and scatters cotton all over the place.

Petilil.White: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
Petilil.Black 2: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
